name: CTHULHU: Frozen Nightmare
description:
Cthulhu waits dreaming... Until some bizarre cultists in the far north awaken him. Use your aircraft to put Cthulhu back into his icy slumber or die trying!

FEATURES:

• INTENSE ARCADE STYLE ACTION

• STORY INSPIRED BY H.P. LOVECRAFT

• LO-FI RETRO INSPIRED AESTHETIC

• SPACE HARRIER MEETS IKARUGA INSPIRED GAMEPLAY

• ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK

• KEYBOARD AND CONTROLLER SUPPORT

---------------------------------------------------------------------

---------------------------------------------------------------------

****SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS****
Tested on Windows 10. (maybe it works on others?)

Requires 250MB of hard drive space.

CPU/GPU: Should work on most systems that can run games from the last 10 years.

Should do 60 FPS somewhat consistently on an i7 or higher with a GTX 970 or higher.
Lowest spec tested on is i5 with intel HD4000 graphics old lenovo laptop. Got around 7 FPS consistently. (Playable)
Keyboard and Mouse or Game Controller

High grade speakers or headphones recommended for maximum spooks.

any problems, email us info at virtuaworlds dot io.

---------------------------------------------------------------------

****HOW TO PLAY****

OBJECTIVE: KEEP CTHULHU TRAPPED IN HIS FROZEN TOMB UNTIL THE TIMER IS OVER, WHILE DESTROYING HIS ALIEN SPAWN. PLASMA SHOTS MELT THE GLACIER, WHILE ICE SHOTS RE-FREEZE IT.

CONTROLS:
USE THE KB ARROWS,  GAMEPAD STICK, OR D-PAD TO NAVIGATE YOUR AIRCRAFT.

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON,  LEFT GAMEPAD TRIGGER OR BOTTOM GAMEPAD BUTTON TO FIRE PLASMA CANNON. (DESTROYS SPAWNED ENEMIES BUT MELTS THE GLACIER)

RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON, RIGHT TRIGGER OR RIGHT GAMEPAD BUTTON TO FIRE ICE CANNON. (FREEZES ENEMIES WITHOUT KILLING THEM BUT RE-FREEZES THE GALCIER)

G  OR GAMEPAD LEFT SHOULDER TO CAPTURE GIFS
C  OR GAMEPAD RIGHT SHOULDER TO CAPTURE SCREENSHOTS

ESC OR START + SELECT TO GO TO MENU

Share your high score online and enter the Twitter leaderboard by taking a screenshot/photo and tag us @virtuaworlds.
